Lyric:
[by:一只猫的生命哲学a]
[ti:The Bright Side]
[ar:Lenka]
[al:The Bright Side]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]


[00:00.77]I’ve got a glass half full and I’m making a toast to you
[00:05.73]
[00:08.60]I’ve got a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow too
[00:14.08]
[00:17.22]Ooh, this is heaven on a lollypop stick
[00:23.44]
[00:24.87]Ooh, life is suddenly sweet
[00:30.34]
[00:31.55]‘Cause I’m living on the bright side
[00:34.34]
[00:35.75]And I wanna stay here, is that okay?
[00:39.14]
[00:39.49]Can’t believe that this is my life
[00:42.49]
[00:43.86]I was just looking, but I started living
[00:46.43]
[00:47.40]On the bright side
[00:49.20]
[00:49.61]Oh wa oh, on the bright side
[01:02.78]
[01:04.04]I got a real dark cloud with a silver lining now
[01:08.80]
[01:11.69]But the grass is greener wherever I lay me down
[01:17.22]
[01:17.57]Ooh, this is heaven on a lollypop stick
[01:26.24]
[01:28.06]Ooh, is this how happiness feels?
[01:33.12]
[01:33.68]When we’re living on the bright side
[01:37.84]
[01:39.01]And we wanna stay here, is that okay?
[01:42.50]
[01:42.71]Can’t believe that this is our life
[01:45.46]
[01:47.18]We were just looking, but we started living
[01:50.97]
[01:51.84]On the bright side
[02:07.58]
[02:09.05]Oh, it’s a hop, skip and jump to a heart full of love
[02:14.99]
[02:16.26]Oh, even if you’re the type to be down in the dumps and gloomy
[02:23.29]
[02:23.70]Take a new look and take it from me
[02:25.28]
[02:25.88]There’s room over here on the bright side 
[02:29.22]
[02:32.36]On the bright side
[02:44.00]
[02:44.45]When we’re living on the bright side
[02:47.85]
[02:48.77]And we wanna stay here, is that okay?
[02:51.81]
[02:52.22]Can’t believe that this is our life
[02:55.91]
[02:56.06]We were just looking, but we started living
[02:59.50]
[02:59.91]When we’re living on the bright side
[03:03.30]
[03:04.46]And we wanna stay here, is that okay?
[03:07.26]
[03:07.67]Can’t believe that this is our life
[03:11.67]
